pullrequest.title: Remove gazebo include subdir from pkgconfig and cmake config

content.html:
I needed the following change to compile examples/stand_alone/publisher:

diff -r 76f163214ef3 examples/stand_alone/publisher/publisher.cc
--- a/examples/stand_alone/publisher/publisher.cc   Tue Sep 03 11:06:37 2013 -0700
+++ b/examples/stand_alone/publisher/publisher.cc   Tue Sep 03 16:29:29 2013 -0700
@@ -19,7 +19,7 @@
 #include <gazebo/gazebo.hh>
 #include <gazebo/transport/transport.hh>
 #include <gazebo/msgs/msgs.hh>
-#include <math/gzmath.hh>
+#include <gazebo/math/gzmath.hh>

 #include <iostream>
